DellGPUSensor.description: This resource shall represents a Graphical Processor sensor, which a hardware device capable of measuring the characteristics of a physical property. This resource represents a managed sensor device and its properties that returns GPU sensor readings such as Power, Thermal and Temparature
DellGPUSensor.longDescription: This resource shall represents a Graphical Processor sensor, which a hardware device capable of measuring the characteristics of a physical property. This resource represents a managed sensor device and its properties that returns GPU sensor readings such as Power, Thermal and Temparature

title: #DellGPUSensor.DellGPUSensor
